content.question: Which of the following is an accurate comparison of the political development of France and the political development of Britain over the course of the 1700s?

choices.label: Britain experienced several periods of political upheaval, while France remained relatively stable.
France preserved its political system until it was violently overthrown, while Britain remained relatively stable.
Both France and Britain ended the century with radically different political systems than they had at the beginning of the century.
Both France and Britain experienced several periods of political instability over the course of the century.

content.answer: France preserved its political system until it was violently overthrown, while Britain remained relatively stable.

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
